name: Space Pirate (RodakDev)
description:
Arrr, me hearty! Welcome to the wacky world of my game, made specially for the Clicker Jam Spring 2023!

Are ye ready to embark on a journey full of adventure, excitement, and downright ridiculousness? Then climb aboard, me hearties, and join me on this epic quest to...well, I'm not really sure where we're going yet, but it's bound to be a wild ride!

Ye see, this game is all about clicking - and I mean a lot of clicking. Ye'll need the reflexes of a pirate and the patience of a sea turtle to make it through this one, but trust me, it's worth it. With every click, ye'll discover new surprises and secrets, and maybe even uncover the greatest treasure of all - a good laugh!

So come on, mateys, what are ye waiting for? Grab yer mouse, flex those fingers, and let's set sail for the Clicker Jam Spring 2023!

Thank a lot to:

Music by K00sin from Pixabay

Music by Dream-Protocol from Pixabay

!WARNING!

The Windows build is not tested!
